summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for project implementation of the City's Community Development Block Grant Program and ratifying and confirming certain acts and expenditures in connection therewith; establishing certain positions in the Departments of Community Development, Buildings and Public Health for the duration of federal funding therefor, and abrogating certain other positions in the Department of Community Development; increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1975 Budgets of said Departments and the Department of Parks and Recreation; making reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
